API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.materials.videoex.VideoSource

type
class
subclasses
sandy.materials.videoex.VideoObjectSource, sandy.materials.videoex.VideoUriSource
version
3.2
since
3.2
The base abstract class for video sources for VideoMaterialEx

Static Variables

DEFAULT_USE_AMF3 : Bool

Set to true to use AMF3 when using VST_RTMP sources. Defaults to false which causes rtmp connections to use AMF0

Instance Variables

appName(default,null) : String

getNetConnectTarget(default,method) : Void -> String

Returns the target for a NetConnection.connect() call

getNetStreamPlayTarget(default,method) : Void -> String

Returns the uri or uri fragment to use for NetStream.play() calls

host(default,null) : String

instanceName(default,null) : String

playLength(default,__setPlayLength) : Float

Number of seconds of stream to play. Defaults to -1 (all of stream)

protocol(default,null) : String

soundVolume(default,__setSoundVolume) : Float

startTime(default,__setStartTime) : Float

type(default,null) : VideoSourceType

uri(default,null) : String

useAmf3(default,null) : Bool
